name: Pancetta Fried Cabbage
author: BlackwaterStout
summary: This is a delicious way to kick up the flavor in what traditionally can be a bland dish. Pancetta adds a wonderful flavor that will win over even the pickiest eaters. This recipe is also great for those of you on low-carb diets.
ingredients: 6 slices pancetta, cut into small strips
¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
1 dash hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®), or to taste  (Optional)
directions: Cook and stir pancetta in a large skillet over medium heat until slightly browned, about 5 minutes
Add onion, garlic, salt, and black pepper; cook until onions become translucent, 5 to 10 minutes
Cook and stir cabbage with pancetta mixture until slightly softened, 5 minutes
Add soy sauce and hot pepper sauce; cook until cabbage is tender, about 10 more minutes
